des:
Now you can use the AiDot skill to interact with your AiDot devices. There are multiple AiDot products for you to control by talking to your Alexa, including WiFi/Zigbee smart light bulbs, and WiFi smart plug. For dimmable smart lights, you can ask Alexa to turn on/off, adjust the brightness, while smart tunnable ones also enable you to change the ambience from warm to cool white. With AiDot skill, you can make the electric appliances connected to the plug be on/off as you want. 

Steps to use AiDot Device with Alexa:
1.Download “AiDot” app in Google Play or iOS App Store;
2.Create a AiDot account and connect the device on the app;
3.Search “AiDot” skill on Alexa, tap “ENABLE TO USE”;
4.Log in your AiDot account on Alexa and wait for Alexa to discover your devices.
5.Try to voice control AiDot devices

Here are some examples of the voice commands:

Lights(bedroom light is the name of the light in AiDot APP):
- Alexa, turn on bedroom light
- Alexa, turn off bedroom light
- Alexa, dim bedroom light
- Alexa, brighten bedroom light
- Alexa, set the bedroom light to 20 percent
- Alexa, set bedroom light to green.
- Alexa, set bedroom light to cool white.

Plugs
- Alexa, turn on plug 1
- Alexa, turn off plug 1

Any problems,please contact us at Support@aidot.com
